messages.title: Health services
messages.content: Passionately protected local health services including home visits, cancer beds and now complex cancer surgery at Worcester Royal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to high-quality healthcare, critical of Conservative and Labour management, intends to secure funding for NHS, and mentions guarantees to mental health and dementia research.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Next election predicted to be a close race between Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives. Emphasizing the tactical voting aspect with the statement 'It's the Lib Dems or the Conservatives here'.

issues.health: Protect local health services including maintaining funding for NHS, addressing management inefficiencies, and making it a core priority.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to make sure local people continue to have high-quality healthcare, free for all, on their doorstep.

politicalExperience.achievements: Protected local health services including home visits, cancer beds and now complex cancer surgery at Worcester Royal.

contactInformation.address: First Floor Office, 19 High Street, Pershore WR10 1AA

quotes.text: Labour has spent on management and administration
The only democratically elected local health boards to decide on our priorities

images.caption: Lib Dem - Richard Burt for West Worcestershire Leaflet Front

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on health as a primary campaign issue, particularly criticizing past expenditure on management and administration by Labour.
